name: classic headband
notes:
this pattern is also available for free on my [blog][1].

classic headband is a simple fall or winter accessory. it's worked in the round, using just one stitch and it's a great project for learning the magic loop method or working with dpns. it's an easy one skein project perfect for gift knitting!

this pattern has been tech edited and test knit.

**sizes**

width: 10 cm (4"), circumference - adjustable

**yarn & yardage**

yardages for 50 - 60 cm (20 - 24") head circumferences: approx. 140 - 170 m (150 - 185 yds) of merino fingering, olivia & oliver fibers, 100% superwash merino, 400 m (437 yds) per 100 g, or similar fingering weight (category 1 - super fine) yarn. sample worked in colorway prickly pear.

**needles & notions**

needles: 3.5 mm (us 4) circular needles 80 - 100 cm (32 - 40”) or dpns, or to fit gauge
notions: stitch marker, tapestry needle, scissors, tape measure

**gauge**

26 stitches x 32 rows in 10x10 cm (4x4”) in stockinette stitch, blocked

  [1]: https://whileberry.com/blog/classic-headband-knitting-pattern
